name: Ogre Battleship
description: Umbras most useful ship.. Good for farming and Good for basing... The more it kills the more it becomes stronger.
obtaining: You can obtain its blueprint by attacking Umbra Hellion Cargo in Umbra sector.
tips-builds: Use mix of Blight and explosive Nova missile.. Ablative armor, Magnetic Collar and Harmonic Thrusters.
author: Useless Sonanochi
